thread.title: Phil
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Phil

author: Phil
title: Phil
text:
Needed replacement valve cartridge for dripping shower.
After finding out from supplier then manufactures that this 6 year old shower valve is no longer made!
With make and model i phoned Shower Doctor and they had valve, ordered and arrived next day in post.
Actually was wrong valve, spoke to them again, sent photos of existing valve which they identified and sent out again which arrived Saturday morning and i fitted and was working Saturday afternoon. Shower Doctor refunded my first payment which arrived back in my account 2days later.
Excellent Service. Will definitely use again and recommend.
Phil
